error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '/' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 32
He needs 160 ice cubes because 10 / (1/16) = <<10/(1/16)=160>>160
It will take him 16 hours because 160 / 10 = <<160/10=16>>16
His ice maker will cost $24 to run because 16 x 1.5 = <<16*1.5=24>>24
He will need 80 ounce of water because 160 / 2 = <<160/2=80>>80
This will cost him $8 because 80 x 0.1 = <<80*0.1=8>>8
It will cost in total $32 to make all the ice because 24 + 8 = <<24+8=32>>32
